general.title: Shopware update ({version})
general.emptyState: You are already on the latest version.

notifications.alreadyUpToDate: You are already on the latest version.

infos.backupCheckboxLabel: I have already created a backup and want to execute the update now.
infos.requirementsNotMet: Not all system requirements are met.

message.phpVersion: Minimum PHP Version: {minVersion}. Currently installed PHP Version: {currentVersion}.
message.mysqlVersion: Minimum MySQL Version: {minVersion}. Currently installed MySQL Version {currentVersion}.
message.writeableCheckValid:
The following directories and files are writable:
{checkedDirectories}
message.writeableCheckFailed:
The following directories and files are not writable:
{failedDirectories}
message.validShopwareLicense: Your current Shopware version is out of date. You may want to consider updating to the latest version.
message.invalidShopwareLicense:
No active Shopware subscription found.
Automatic updates cannot be performed.
You may want to purchase a Shopware subscription via the Shopware account page.

actions.deactivateNone: I am aware of the implicit dangers and still want to update Shopware without deactivating incompatible plugins first. I am conscious, that Shopware cannot guarantee the functionality of my installation after an incompatible update.

plugins.pluginNotInStore: This plugin is not available in the store. Please contact the plugin's author.
plugins.pluginWillBeDeactivatedHint: (This plugin will be deactivated on update)

updateModal.messageIncompatible: Some of the plugins installed are not compatible with the latest Shopware version. If you continue updating now, unknown issues could occur and gravely harm your system. Shopware is able to automatically deactivate incompatible plugins during the update process in order to ensures the continued functionality of your installation. After updating these plugins accordingly, you will have the possibility to re-activate them manually.
updateModal.messageNotInStore: There are plugins installed that could not successfully be tested for compatibility. Please contact the plugin's author(s) for more information. In this case it is strongly recommended to create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageOkay: All prerequisites fulfilled. Don't forget to create a backup before updating.
updateModal.messageUpdateCheck: Your current version can be updated to {version}. What do you want to do?
updateModal.backupLabel: Yes, I've already created a backup.
